name: AI Dragon
description: AI Dragon is a Solana blockchain-based initiative aimed at democratizing artificial intelligence by offering a decentralized marketplace for AI tools and services. Governed by a DAO, the project introduces its native token, $ChatGPT, to stimulate community participation and innovation. The project challenges the existing AI monopolies by encouraging equitable AI technology distribution, supported by the Dream Building Plan that provides funding avenues for AI ventures, with $ChatGPT at the core of its ecosystem to incentivize contributions and transactions.
